name: Nyan Cat [aka png --> card10 converter]
description:
Feeling a little Nyan? So was I.

Welcome to the Nyan Cat club.

This project is still a little kitten, so please bear with the issues.

To use:
Find my hardcoding of various png files.
Then run a command to convert it to a python list for processing by the micropython board: "python convert_image.py > nyan.py" <--- such a hack...but w/e it's camp not work :p

Once the image is converted, Copy over of the app to your phone, and presto, nyan cat is there.

Rev 1-4: 
- basic functionality + doc
Rev 5:
- add battery status (thank [card10 nickname](https://badge.team/projects/card10_nickname) for the code)
author: John Naulty
